documents.document: @JetstarAirways hi. I left my Canon G16 camera on board JQ720 from Hob-Syd today. It contains many precious memories. Desperate to find it.

Perpetual Loyal wins line honours in the #rolexsydneyhobart in record time! We're live to Hobart and we speak to @Erin_Molan @TheTodayShow
Actress Carrie Fisher of Star Wars fame has died aged 60, four days after suffering a heart attack on a flight. Details @TheTodayShow
Big news: Wild Oats X1 is out of the Sydney to Hobart due to a broken hydraulic ram @TheTodayShow #rolexsydneyhobart
